T02D2950:29a-0: @29a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2950:29a-1: sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D2950:29a-2: gnas yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs
T02D2950:29a-3: pa sngon du song bas sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs
T02D2950:29a-4: te / sa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing
T02D2950:29a-5: chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon
T02D2950:29a-6: te / bkye ste / dbus padma 'dab ma bzhi
T02D2950:29a-7: pa ste lte ba ljang gu padma rigs kyi mdog
T02D2950:29a-8: lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje rab dkar
T02D2950:29a-9: te / bkye ste / pos bskor ba / gong
T02D2950:29a-10: ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs padmas
T02D2950:29a-11: te / bkye ste / pos bskor ba / mtshan
T02D2950:29a-12: pa / sgo bzhi rta babs su yod pa bris
T02D2950:29a-13: te / bkye ste / pos bskor ba / mtshan
T02D2950:29a-14: pa / la / mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum
T02D2950:29a-15: pa lnga la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2950:29a-16: lha so so'i mtshan ma btab la so so'i gnas
T02D2950:29a-17: su bzhag / sgo bzhir phur bu bzhi la dar
T02D2950:29a-18: le brgan gyi con pan btags la gzugs /
T02D2950:29a-19: de yang ras kyi skud pa la rma bya'i mdongs kyis sprel lo //
T02D2950:29a-20: p'u dza'i bye brag lnga lnga bsham /
T02D2950:29a-21: phyogs skyong ba'i gtor ma'i tshogs legs par bshams la /
T02D2950:29a-22: de nas dbus kyi bum pa la rdo rje rnam
T02D2950:29a-23: par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gu rgyan thams cad
T02D2950:29a-24: kyis brgyan pa / de nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs la bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02D2950:29a-25: de nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2950:29a-26: aom badzra aam ku sha sv'a h'a /
T02D2950:29a-27: aom badzra p'a sha sv'a h'a /
T02D2950:29a-28: aom badzra spho ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2950:29a-29: aom badzra ghande sv'a h'a zhes so so'i bum pa la dmigs te /
T02D2950:29a-30: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod pas shar phyogs kyi bum par padma dang zla ba'i steng du /
T02D2950:29a-31: dza: las lha mo mdog dkar mo'i lag na lcags
T02D2950:29a-32: kyu thogs pa zhal bag tsam khro ba rgyan thams
T02D2950:29a-34: skra ser po gyen la brdzes pa /
T02D2950:29a-36: lhor h'um las lha mo ser mo rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D2950:29b-0: phyag na rdo rje zhags pa rtse gsum pas @29b
T02D2950:29b-1: mtshan pa thogs pa thod pas brgyan pa bskyed do
T02D2950:29b-2: // nub tu bam las lha mo dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshan pa bskyed do //
T02D2950:29b-3: byang du ho: las lha mo ljang ser lag na dril bu dkrol ba bskyed la /
T02D2950:29b-4: de dag gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2950:29b-5: steng du so so'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
T02D2950:29b-6: la / ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar so so'i
T02D2950:29b-7: sa bon la so so'i sngags kyi phreng bas bskor
T02D2950:29b-8: ba'i sngags kyi rang sgra la dmigs te /
T02D2950:29b-9: bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2950:29b-11: aom bi ja ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2950:29b-12: aom aa dzi te sv'a h'a /
T02D2950:29b-13: aom dzv'a la sv'a h'a zhes so so'i bum pa la dmigs te /
T02D2950:29b-14: khri phrag re bzlas te stong gis mchod pa 'bul /
T02D2950:29b-15: spyan drang ba dang bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02D2950:29b-16: phyag btsal ba dang bstod pa re bya /
T02D2950:29b-17: de ltar bzlas pa byas la lha so so 'od
T02D2950:29b-18: du zhu chu bdud rtsir gyur pa las lha mo
T02D2950:29b-20: phyi nang gi dbang bdag la bskur bar dmigs la /
T02D2950:29b-21: de nas slob ma bskyed pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2950:29b-22: la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2950:29b-26: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
T02D2950:29b-27: sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho
T02D2950:29b-28: ga / rin po che dri ma med pa zhes
